data.current_summary: Returns latest exchange rates in parameter-supplied base currency.
data.summary_suggestion: Fetch latest exchange rates for base currency
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the most recent exchange rates for a specified base currency. Accepts a base currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP) as a path parameter and returns current conversion rates to all supported target currencies. No authentication required. Returns a JSON object containing the base currency, timestamp, and a rates object with currency codes as keys and exchange rate values.
